alert.note: Alert for Inland Miami-Dade County; Metropolitan Miami Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 6:19PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Miami-Dade County through 645 PM EDT... At 619 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm near Intersection Krome And Kendall Drive, or 8 miles north of The Redland, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... The Redland, Richmond West, Country Walk, Kendale Lakes, West Kendall, Intersection Krome And Kendall Drive, Miccosukee Resort, Zoo Miami, The Crossings, The Hammocks, Richmond Heights, Tamiami, Kendall West, Inlikita, Three Lakes and Palmetto Estates. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Inland Miami-Dade County; Metropolitan Miami Dade
